description: Learn how to build and develop awesome android apps using just five projects. Here you will learn the basic concepts about how to construct project templates to create a active android application. You will also learn the basics of the Java programming language while building these projects. These applications we build in this course can be tested and installed onto physical android devices.You will get the basic skills to know what is needed and how to quickly but android apps together. This course will cover creating android apps, building project templates for faster and painless development, building User Interfaces(GUI), connecting widgets from the user interface to the java source code, how to carry out actions when the user interacts with the widgets, and deploy and install the apps onto physical devices. This course is taught using a simple approach by building and creating projects and understanding step-by-step how it works. Enrolling in this course, you will go from knowing nothing to building live apps to that can run on a wide variety of android devices. If your not satisfied, you'll receive a full-refund no questions asked. Give it go, rate five star, and comment. :-)
title: Learn Android From Scratch: The Easy Beginner's Guide
